channel.title: Comments on: About
channel.description: Database technologies - especially around scalability and High Availability

item.title: By: sanil
item.dc:creator: sanil
item.description:
I have an issue with our mysql ndb cluster. Always throwing an error node x disconnected and Lost arbitrator node 1 - process failure [state=6].Could you please help me to resolve these issues. Is it related to network outage ?

item.content:encoded:
I have an issue with our mysql ndb cluster. Always throwing an error node x disconnected and Lost arbitrator node 1 – process failure [state=6].Could you please help me to resolve these issues. Is it related to network outage ?

item.title: By: andrew
item.dc:creator: andrew
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/about#comment-118013">Trevor Lowing</a>.
Hi Trevor,
I'd recommend getting the consultancy from the MySQL team... <a href="http://www.mysql.com/consulting/" title="MySQL Consulting" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">http://www.mysql.com/consulting/</a>
Disclaimer - they are also my employer!
Best Regards, Andrew.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Trevor Lowing.

Hi Trevor,

I’d recommend getting the consultancy from the MySQL team… http://www.mysql.com/consulting/

Disclaimer – they are also my employer!

Best Regards, Andrew.

item.title: By: Trevor Lowing
item.dc:creator: Trevor Lowing
item.description:
Andrew,
I'm working on a new project that requires clustered MySQL with capability of geographic redundancy. Who would you recommend for engaging consulting services? This in in Virginia.
Thanks,
Trevor
item.content:encoded:
Andrew,

I’m working on a new project that requires clustered MySQL with capability of geographic redundancy. Who would you recommend for engaging consulting services? This in in Virginia.

Thanks,

Trevor

item.title: By: andrew
item.dc:creator: andrew
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/about#comment-29852">Pedro</a>.
Could you tell me what command you ran? What platform was this on?
Andrew.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Pedro.

Could you tell me what command you ran? What platform was this on?

Andrew.

item.title: By: Pedro
item.dc:creator: Pedro
item.description:
I have issues:
Connect to MySQL Cluster Manager by running "/home/pedro/mysql-mcm/mcm1.2.4/bin/mcm" -a eletron:1862 Configuring default cluster 'mycluster'... ERROR: Unable to create site, aborting bootstrap! ERROR 2004: (00MGR) Host eletron is not a member of site mysite
Helpe-me please! Thank you!
item.content:encoded:
I have issues:

Connect to MySQL Cluster Manager by running “/home/pedro/mysql-mcm/mcm1.2.4/bin/mcm” -a eletron:1862
Configuring default cluster ‘mycluster’…
ERROR: Unable to create site, aborting bootstrap!
ERROR 2004: (00MGR) Host eletron is not a member of site mysite

Helpe-me please! Thank you!
